Name: The Wanderer
Description: The Wanderer is a lonely spread. A single card, to answer a single, yet perhaps not simple question. She may help you with a conundrum; a specific, yet not closed question.

Name: The Nuns
Description: The sisterly nuns may show you duality. A chance to differ what one ought to do, and what one ought to avoid. Their holy guidance will stop you from devilish actions, whilst leading you to more pious lands.

Name: The Spies
Description: The Spies consist of three agents infiltrating the timeline of your existence. Each spy reports back from a different front: one watches the shadows of your Past, one observes the hidden movements of your Present, and the third gazes into the fog of your Future.

Name: The Lords
Description: The Lords represent four powerful camps of the self. Each Lord governs a specific domain of your life: the physical strength of the Body, the sharp logic of the Mind, the ethereal reaches of Spirit, and the mysterious depths of the Subconscious.
